name: Flyfofa Aviation Training (Pty) Ltd
about: Flyfofa Aviation Training (Pty) Ltd, based in Wonderboom National Airport, Pretoria, is a South African aviation organization dedicated to providing high-quality aviation services. Established to meet the growing demands of the aviation industry, Flyfofa offers comprehensive training programs for Private Pilot Licenses, as well as training for cabin crew and other aviation professionals. The company also extends its services to include aircraft leasing, aeromedical, charter, and cargo operations. With a commitment to reliability and excellence, Flyfofa Aviation Training is a trusted name in aviation education and services, ensuring that all trainees receive the best possible preparation for their careers in aviation.
services:
["Cabin Crew License
Class Rating
Flight Instructor 
Instrument Rating 
Night Rating"]
